column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////THEY HAVE SHELLFISH IN ALL THEIR BROTHS FOR THE RAMENS! My friend is having an allergic reaction and I called to see if it's possible that they could've been Â cross contamination between something and shrimp which they just added to their menu
column2: and the worker in the phone told me all their broths contain shellfish. BE CAREFUL IF YOU HAVE AN ALLERGY BECAUSE THEY DON'T SAY IT ANYWHERE ON THE MENU!!
